home.senaDescription:
This video "SENA is Colombia" is an official production of the National Training Service (SENA), a Colombian public entity attached to the Ministry of Labor. The purpose of this video is to highlight the fundamental role of SENA in the social and economic development of the country, emphasizing its commitment to comprehensive professional training and the employability of Colombians.

The production features testimonials from apprentices, instructors, and entrepreneurs who have benefited from SENA programs, showing how the institution contributes to the personal and professional growth of millions of citizens. It also emphasizes SENA's presence throughout the national territory, its focus on technological innovation, and its role in promoting entrepreneurship

feature3.desc: Ensures your company complies with national regulations.

diagnosis.completeFields: Complete the fields to register the Business Diagnosis
diagnosis.section1Title: Business Diagnosis for SENA Apprentice Assignment
diagnosis.section1Description: Fill out the diagnosis to know what apprentices you need
diagnosis.economicSector: What is the main economic sector?
diagnosis.educationLevel: What education level do you look for in apprentices?
diagnosis.cybersecurityInterest: Are you interested in topics like cybersecurity or data protection?
diagnosis.biodegradableMaterials: Do you use biodegradable or eco-friendly materials?
diagnosis.designSoftware: Do you use design and pattern software (Audaces, Optitex, etc.)?
diagnosis.frequentSupplies: What supplies do you use most frequently?
diagnosis.processTools: Do you use milling machine or drill press in your processes?
diagnosis.machineryOperation: Are you interested in apprentices working directly in machinery operation?
diagnosis.electricalMaintenance: Do you perform electrical network maintenance?
diagnosis.specializedTools: Do you have specialized tools like multimeters, clamp meters or insulation testers?
diagnosis.heightSafety: Do you apply safety standards for working at heights?
diagnosis.apprenticeType: What type of apprentice do you want to receive?
diagnosis.itServices: What type of IT services do you offer or use?
diagnosis.completeAllFields: Please complete all fields before continuing.
diagnosis.loginRequired: You must log in to submit the diagnosis.
diagnosis.analyzingResponses: We are analyzing your responses and generating recommendations.
diagnosis.successfullyProcessed: Your diagnosis has been successfully processed.
diagnosis.processingError: An error occurred while processing your diagnosis.
